item.title: London Underground?
item.dc:creator: Dr_Karamazov
item.description:
Will the maps help convey how old and crappy the tube is?

You’re not really giving us much to comment on other than a video and a couple of screen shots.
The trains look too clean. If you can throw on some dirtier textures it would help.

People are going to die in the tube over the Olympics. It can barely cope with the amount of passengers it gets at the moment, so God help London when it suddenly sees an increase in people.

Read full topic
